name: "Gnocchi" of Hass Avocado with Apples and Shaved Walnuts
description: This recipe is from the French Laundry, the chef Thomas Keller's restaurant in Yountville, Calif. It was published as part of a 2001 story about the raw food movement, in which every element of every dish is raw, organic and vegan.
keywords: appetizer, apple, avocado, black walnuts, raw, vegan
recipeIngredient: 1 Sierra Beauty or Golden Delicious apple
3 black walnuts, meat removed as intact as possible and lightly toasted
3 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Peel, core and cut apple into 1/4-inch dice. Toss with lemon juice; set aside. Using a truffle slicer, shave walnuts; set aside.

Cut two avocados in half lengthwise, and discard pits. Using a fluted oval melon-baller, scoop out avocados. (There should be 5 to 6 pieces from each avocado half; use an additional avocado if desired.) Place avocado in a bowl, and season with salt and peppercorns to taste. Add olive oil, vinegar and apples, and toss lightly to mix.
Place a portion of avocado mixture in center of each of four serving plates. Cover with shaved walnuts, and serve.
